metadata.name: Lovely Human- Arvind Saraf
metadata.description:
This is a living utility NFT  with the following benefits : 1) 5 hours of time with the expert 2) Re-sale and customization of the Artwork 3) Joint IP of the conversation which can be tokenized as a NFT with 90% of sale to you and expert 4) Access to exclusive community and events with all current and future experts 5) Your work with this expert will be showcased at the worldâ€™s first Metaverse Museum of Industry expert Wisdom.
Arvind is an Engineering Leader & Entrepreneur trained at IIT, MIT & Google. He specializes in building technology products from the first line of code up and has a strong interest and understanding of deep technology and emerging markets.
